lead_paragraph: With two runners aboard in the sixth inning, the Royals' Alcides Escobar was just trying to put the pitch from Yankees reliever Blake Parker in play Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Gee, Escobar Lead Red-Hot Royals to 8-5 Win Over Yankees
headline.main: Gee, Escobar Lead Red-Hot Royals to 8-5 Win Over Yankees
